query.value:
@concat('SELECT srd_id,
	sd_reviewid,
	site,
	site_id,
	replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_title, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_title,
    replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_content, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_content,
	srd_writer,
	srd_writetime,
	srd_rate,
	srd_crawl_time
	FROM ',
pipeline().parameters.SourceTable,
 ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -',pipeline().parameters.date,' DAY)
 ')

@concat('SELECT srd_id,
	sd_reviewid,
	site,
	site_id,
	replace(replace(replace(srd_title,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂'') as srd_title,
    replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_content,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'','''') as srd_content,
	srd_writer,
	srd_writetime,
	srd_rate,
	srd_crawl_time
	FROM ',
pipeline().parameters.SourceTable,
 ' WHERE srd_content like ''병이 네모나서%''')

@concat('SELECT srd_id,
	sd_reviewid,
	site,
	site_id,
	replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_title, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_title,
    replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_content, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_content,
	srd_writer,
	srd_writetime,
	srd_rate,
	srd_crawl_time
	FROM ',
pipeline().parameters.SourceTable,
 ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') BETWEEN DATE(''2023-12-04'') AND DATE(''2023-12-05'') AND SITE =''마켓컬리_STORE''')
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ')) STARTDT FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' ORDER BY STARTDT')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = ','DATE(''', item().STARTDT, ''')')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY)')

oracleReaderQuery.value: select CD_IF.FUNC_CDI_LOG(  'I' , p_pipline => 'PIP_API_CUSTOMER_ASSOCIATION_TRAN' ) as result from dual;
